import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import "./reserve.css" import { faCircleXmark } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch" const Reserve = ({setOpen, hotelId}) => { const { data, loading, error } = useFetch(`room/${hotelId}`) return (
setOpen(false)}/> Select your Rooms: {data.map(item=>(
{item.title}
{item.desc}
Max People: {item.maxPeople}
{item.price}
{item.roomNumbers.map(roomNumber=>(
))}
))}
) } export default Reserve
